k, s = input(), input()
if k > len(s):
    print(s)
else:
    print(s[:k] + '...') 


k = int(input())
s = str(input())

print(s[0:k] + "..." if len(s) > k else s) 

#!/usr/bin/env python3
# -----Answer-----

k = int(input())
s = str(input())
print(s[:k] + '...' if len(s) > k else s)

k = int(input())
s = str(input())

print(s[0:k] + "..." if k < len(s) else s)


# -----Answer-----

k = int(input())
s = str(input())
print(s[:k] + '...' if len(s) > k else s + '...')

k, s = input(), input()
if k >= len(s):
    print(s)
else:
    print(s[:k] + '...')
